TopicTitle: Forums up for 12 hours and already crashed?

Articles.Content: Guys, you have to feed your kerbals more than just Coke and Skittles if you want that hamster wheel to keep turning..

I don't think they would have noticed it as quick had I not noticed and reported it via email.

Roland
Did it rset our accounts too? I lost mine.
It was up and down all night. Same behavior as last week, sometimes no response, sometimes extremely slow

I don't think they would have noticed it as quick had I not noticed and reported it via email.

Roland

This time.

Roland

Did it rset our accounts too? I lost mine.

The last one deleted my account, but this one didn't.

I've started putting my story of the Great Kbritain Space Agency on its very own facebook page, don't fancy putting it on here then a crash causing it to get lost.

Roland

There's a good chance nothing has been done with it yet this time. Like last time it gets unstable for periods then better again. If enough people speak up they may be convinced to change hosts for the forums

Also, accounts got deleted because apparently the last time there was a stable backup was October of last year. Not something that will happen often.
If i use direct links to sub forums I can get them to load, but trying to use the main forum page results in a "server maintenance"

If i use direct links to sub forums I can get them to load, but trying to use the main forum page results in a "server maintenance"

I had the same issue, until I cleared the cache. Now it works.
Agreed, they are going up and down more than my grade in French...

Agreed, they are going up and down more than my grade in French...

Or my mark in German!

I'm still waiting for my account to be confirmed, I think.. Just chill out, they're trying.

Edit:

I CAN POST! Cool!

Or my mark in German!

Weiterhin viel Erfolg beim Lernen!
